renderpass.name: Image

renderpass.code:
#define N 150.
#define R iResolution.xy
#define A(U) texelFetch(iChannel0,ivec2(U),0)
#define B(U) texelFetch(iChannel1,ivec2(U),0)
#define C(U) texelFetch(iChannel2,ivec2(U),0)
#define D(U) texelFetch(iChannel3,ivec2(U),0)
#define ei(a) mat2(cos(a),-sin(a),sin(a),cos(a))

#define Main void mainImage( out vec4 Q, in vec2 U)
#define gauss( i, std) 0.3989422804/(std)*exp(-.5*(i)*(i)/(std)/(std))

#define charge(i) (sign(cos(i)))
renderpass.name: Common
Buffer A
Buffer B
Buffer C
Buffer D
